title: My Boyfriend Is a Husky - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Showbiz
author: 一只爪子
description:
Hua Chiqing: I had a crush on this person for three years, and finally had the opportunity to confess, but he died. 

Yang Ziye: What should I do if I suddenly became a dog? What should I do if the master has a crush on me? The master masturbating looks so cute! I want him! 

Why do I become human every time the master masturbates?>
